info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Reeves and northeastern Jeff Davis Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 241 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of McDonald Observatory, or 15 miles southeast of Kent, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Balmorhea State Park, Buffalo Trail Scout Camp, Star Mountain and Toyahvale. This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 199 and 206. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
